title: German Chancellors and Presidents - Behind the Name
snippet: The office was established in 1919 during the Weimar Republic and re-established in 1949 in West Germany. In German the Chancellor was originally called Reichskanzler meaning "imperial chancellor". Since 1949 the title is Bundeskanzler meaning "federal chancellor" (the first female chancellor, ...
